messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
That Bike you’ve got there...it’s the
type that can change gears!You gotta love that!
Sure, I’ll give you a battle!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
The 3-speed makes for easy turning,
and the 4-speed’s for going fast.I love them both!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Is your bicycle geared to 3-speed now?
Or do you have it set to 4-speed?
